item.description:
After discussion, it looks Smarts mountain is our choice.

--------------------------------------------------------------

I'm planning on a small hike Thursday morning. I can do Mt. Cardigan (from the West side). Or if anyone wants to do Smarts, Kearsarge, maybe Cube, or anything else in the 1000-1500 foot gain range that'll work as well (generally I don't get any takers on these last minute midweek hikes, but always worth a shot). I'm hiking Mt. Lafayette on Saturday and just want a little tuneup. Leisurely pace is fine. Flexible on the time, but prefer morning over afternoon.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike SMARTS mountain (or other...see details) Thurs Morning 5\\/31
